description: [``botocore``] Update emr client to latest version

[``botocore``] The Amazon CodeGuru Reviewer API now includes the RuleMetadata data object and a Severity attribute on a RecommendationSummary object. A RuleMetadata object contains information about a rule that generates a recommendation. Severity indicates how severe the issue associated with a recommendation is.
[``botocore``] Added OffCondition parameter to CreateModel API
